title: RP
body: I bought the 20$ RP, my mom got a message saying i paid for it but it said error, invalid Credit Card Information. i didnt get the RP either.

replies.body: We'd like to help with this and figure out what happened!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will be happy to take a look.  We'll reach out in your ticket as soon possible!
